cause.description:
This is a florida based company that helps in reducing animal overpopulation by spaying/neutering. Also educates the community about animal abuse. Provides homes for abandoned animals, enforces animal abuse laws, and helps animals after natural disasters. for more info look up:Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals of Central Florida.
1. Fur is for animals
2. Test on humans, not animals
cause.mission: save the animals from their needless suffering
cause.name: Stop Needless Animal Abuse
